original_text: And on the day you cross over the Jordan to the land that the Lord your God is giving you, you shall set up large stones and plaster them with plaster.
korean_text: 너희가 요단을 건너 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅에 들어가는 날에 큰 돌들을 세우고 석회를 바르라

sentences.original_text: And on the day you cross over the Jordan
to the land that the Lord your God is giving you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 주시는 땅으로

sentences.original_text: you shall set up large stones
